message.entry: {0} must be a 2-element vector.
MaxSize value must be greater than MinSize value.
MaxSize value must be greater than [{0} {1}].
MinSize value must be greater than or equal to [{0} {1}].
Unable to find model {0}.
Unable to find model {0}. The default classification model, {1}, will be loaded.
Width of the training data table must be greater than or equal to 2.
First column of the training data must contain image filenames.
Width of the detection results table must be greater than or equal to 2.
Detections results table must contain labels in the third column when there are multiple classes in the ground truth data.
Invalid bounding box in row {0}, column {1} of the ground truth data table: {2}.
Invalid bounding box in row {0} of the detection results table: {1}.
Invalid score value in row {0} of the detection results table: {1}.
Invalid label value in row {0} of the detection results table: {1}.
Label value in row {0} of the detection results table must be one of the following categorical values: {1}.
Size of the input ROI, {0}, must be greater than ''MinSize'', {1}.
Size of the input ROI, {0}, must be greater than the size of the classification model, {1}.
Size of the input image, {0}, must be greater than the ''MinSize'', {1}.
Size of the input image, {0}, must be greater than the size of the classification model, {1}.
Size of the object is invalid.
Training data for class {0} should have at least one bounding box.
Training data must contain at least one bounding box.
Invalid bounding box in row {0} of the bounding box table: {1}.
Invalid label value in row {0} of the bounding box table: {1}.
Label value in row {0} of the bounding box table is undefined. It must be one of the following categorical values: {1}.
Invalid input image channel size. Input image channel size {0,number,integer} must be the same as the network's input channel size {1,number,integer}.
Input image size must be greater than {0}.
Input datatype must be uint8, uint16, int16, double or single.
Evaluation ground truth data input must be a table or a datastore.
Bounding box from the read method output of the datastore must be an M-by-1 cell array.
Invalid bounding box data from the datastore read method:\n{0}
Label from the read method output of the datastore must be an M-by-1 cell array containing elements of N-by-1 categorical, where N equals the number of bounding boxes.
Output of the read method of the input datastore must be an M-by-3 or M-by-2 cell or table.
Training data input must be a table or a datastore.
Read method of the training input datastore must return an M-by-3 cell or table.
Read method of the training input datastore must return an M-by-3 or M-by-2 cell or table.
Bounding box column from the read method output of the training input datastore must be an M-by-1 cell array, containing elements of N-by-4 double matrix, where N equals the number of bounding boxes.

Labels column from the read method output of the training input datastore must be an M-by-1 cell array containing elements of N-by-1 categorical, where N equals the number of bounding boxes.\n\nThe categories of the categorical must contain all the label names for all of the training data.
Images column from the read method output of the training input datastore must be an M-by-1 cell array containing elements of N-by-P-by-Q images or N-by-P grayscale images.

Training data from a read of the input datastore contains invalid bounding boxes. Bounding boxes must be non-empty, fully contained within their associated image and must have positive width and height. Use datastore transform method and remove invalid bounding boxes.
Validation data must be a datastore, when training data is a datastore. The read method of the validation datastore must return an M-by-3 cell or table.
Validation data not supported when training data input is a table. Use a datstore as both validation data and the training data input.
Training option DispatchInBackground is not supported with datastore training data input. The value of ''options.DispatchInBackground'' must be 'false'.

Training data associated with the following file is invalid:

{0}
Number of classes in the training data must be 1.

Bounding boxes returned by the input datastore read method must be an M-by-1 cell array that contains numeric N-by-4 matrices defining [x y width height] values of N boxes, and the width and height of all the boxes must be positive.
Class of the image data returned by the input datastore read method must be double, single, uint8, int16, uint16, or logical. The image data must also be non-empty, non-sparse, and real.
Images returned by the input datastore read method must be RGB or grayscale and stored in an M-by-1 cell array, where M is the number of images.
Bounding boxes associated with the following image were not all located within the image: {0}\n
Input data must be a datastore.
Read method of the input datastore must return a numeric array or an M-by-N cell or table containing elements of N-by-P-by-Q or N-by-P numeric arrays.
Images must have the same size when the MiniBatchSize value is greater than 1. To detect objects in images of varying size, set the MiniBatchSize value to 1.
Datastore input does not have any data. Every call to the read method returns empty.
An error occurred while processing the following file from the input datastore:\n\n{0}
An error occurred while processing data from the input datastore.
Metrics property of the Experiment Monitor input must be empty.
Specified Experiment Monitor must be of type experiments.Monitor.
Training option "Plots" must be "none" when specifying the Experiment Monitor option.
